job_description: Mobify is seeking amazing Junior Front-End Engineers to join us for the spring Co-op term for either 4, or 8 months. As a Junior Front-End Engineer Co-op, you'll win the hearts and minds of our amazing clients with your technical kung-fu. You'll epitomize the front-end mobile magic Mobify is renowned for with your exhaustive knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript. You will work on our Customer Success Team, the team who is responsible for the development and roll-out of the Mobify platform for our premium customers. This is leading edge work for some of the biggest and most recognized brands such as Starbucks, ideeli, Threadless, BT, Expedia, Beyond the Rack, and NBC.Check out some of our open source projects: http://github.com/mobifyResponsibilitiesMaintain mobile websites powered by Mobify and open source frameworksQuickly investigate and understand customer websites and codebasesSolve complex front-end web development problems experienced by our customersConsult Front-End Engineers and Designers to tackle the really tough customer issuesSupport our vast customer base in a friendly, constructive and clear mannerBuild out documentation for common issues and helpful hints/tutorialsContribute to adaptive.js and our custom web development plugins
